Instantly.AddIRCMessage: @Vortex Great, I've got the Med File, can make that guy look like a junkie
You wiped his degrees?
Yes, there were three degrees
Good, I can corner him now
If he won't tell, I just going to ruin his life
Why do you think he would know where to find that Cypher guy?
My sources are saying they were close, maybe even cooperated on that drug business
I'll just make this world one dirty cop lesser
So I can't say I am a bad guy
And thank you for your help, what you done is really important to me
And as I said, I will give you the complete fix for the map, and there will be access to NightHawks sa well
Interested in joining in?
NightHawks?
Yeah, we kind of could use your abilities and that log-disguise feature is pretty good as I can see
I have to continue my search and make someone pay
With a few portbreakers? If his is so hard to find and so powerful, I think he will crush you again, no offence
But if you become one of us, we could help each other
You will help with our contracts and we will provide you all intel about your guy
What you think?
Maybe
In any case, I'll activate the fix and there will be access data as well
It will show up on your terminal
Don't think for too long
We will change access details in a few hours
Here is your fix
